name: Chiara Siracusa
description: '''Chiara Siracusa''' (born 25 September 1976), often known [[mononym]]ously as '''Chiara''', is a Maltese singer. She represented her country in the [[Eurovision Song Contest]] in [[Eurovision Song Contest 1998|1998]], [[Eurovision Song Contest 2005|2005]], and [[Eurovision Song Contest 2009|2009]] and is with a second and a third place the third most successful participant who never won the contest (behind Germany's [[Katja Ebstein]] and [[Wind (band)|Wind]]).
